Verses: 1 appozhudhu, Paralogaraajyam Thangal Theevattigalaip Pidiththukkondu Manavaalanukku Edhirkondupogap Purappatta Paththuk Kannikaigalukku Oppaayirukkum.
2 avargalil Aindhuper Puththiyullavargalum, Aindhuper Puththiyillaadhavargalumaayirundhaargal.
3 puththiyillaadhavargal Thangal Theevattigalai Eduththukkonduponaargal, Enneyaiyo Koodakkondupogavillai.
4 puththiyullavargal Thangal Theevattigalodungoodath Thangal Paaththirangalil Enneyaiyum Konduponaargal.
5 manavaalan Varath Thaamadhiththapodhu Avargal Ellaarum Niththiraimayakkamadaindhu Thoongivittaargal.
6 naduraaththiriyile: Idho Manavaalan Varugiraar, Avarukku Edhirkondu Pogap Purappadungal Engira Saththam Undaayitru.
7 appozhudhu Andhak Kannikaigal Ellaarum Ezhundhirundhu, Thangal Theevattigalai Aayaththappaduththinaargal.
8 puththiyillaadhavargal Puththiyullavargalai Nokki: Ungal Enneyil Engalukkuk Konjangodungal, Engal Theevattigal Anaindhupogiradhe Endraargal.
9 puththiyullavargal Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Appadiyalla, Engalukkum Ungalukkum Podhaamaliraadhapadi, Neengal Virkiravargalidaththir Poi, Ungalukkaaga Vaangikkollungal Endraargal.
10 appadiye Avargal Vaangap Ponapodhu Manavaalan Vandhuvittaar; Aayaththamaayirundhavargal Avarode Koodak Kaliyaana Veettirkul Piravesiththaargal; Kadhavum Adaikkappattadhu.
11 pinbu, Matrak Kannikaigalum Vandhu: Aandavare, Aandavare Engalukkuth Thirakkavendum Endraargal.
12 adharku Avar: Ungalai Ariyen Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
13 manushakumaaran Varum Naalaiyaavadhu Naazhikaiyaiyaavadhu Neengal Ariyaadhirukkirapadiyaal Vizhiththirungal.
14 andriyum Paralogaraajyam Puraththesaththukkup Pirayaanamaaip Pogira Oru Manushan, Than Oozhiyakkaararai Azhaiththu, Than Aasthigalai Avargal Vasamaai Oppukkoduththadhupol Irukkiradhu.
15 avanavanudaiya Thiramaikkuththakkathaaga, Oruvanidaththil Aindhu Thaalandhum, Oruvanidaththil Irandu Thaalandhum, Oruvanidaththil Oru Thaalandhum, Koduththu, Udane Pirayaanappattup Ponaan.
16 aindhu Thaalandhai Vaanginavan Poi, Avaigalaikkondu Viyaapaaram Panni, Veru Aindhu Thaalandhai Sampaadhiththaan.
17 appadiye Irandu Thaalandhai Vaanginavanum, Veru Irandu Thaalandhai Sampaadhiththaan.
18 oru Thaalandhai Vaanginavano, Poi, Nilaththaith Thondi, Than Ejamaanudaiya Panaththaip Pudhaiththu Vaiththaan.
19 vegukaalamaanapinbu Andha Oozhiyakkaararudaiya Ejamaan Thirumpivandhu, Avargalidaththil Kanakkukkettaan.

20 appozhudhu Aindhu Thaalandhai Vaanginavan Veru Aindhu Thaalandhaik Konduvandhu: Aandavane, Aindhu Thaalandhai Ennidaththil Oppuviththeere; Avaigalaikkondu, Idho Veru Aindhu Thaalandhai Sampaadhiththen Endraan.

21 avanudaiya Ejamaan Avanai Nokki: Nalladhu, Uththamamum Unmaiyumaana Oozhiyakkaarane, Konjaththile Unmaiyaayirundhaai, Anegaththin Mel Unnai Adhikaariyaaga Vaippen, Un Ejamaanudaiya Sandhoshaththirkul Piravesi Endraan.
22 irandu Thaalandhai Vaanginavanum Vandhu: Aandavane, Irandu Thaalandhai Ennidaththil Oppuviththeere; Avaikalaikkondu, Idho Veru Irandu Thaalandhai Sampaadhiththen Endraan.

23 avanudaiya Ejamaan Avanai Nokki: Nalladhu, Uththamamum Unmaiyumulla Oozhiyakkaarane, Konjaththile Unmaiyaayirundhaai, Anegaththin Mel Unnai Adhikaariyaaga Vaippen; Un Ejamaanudaiya Sandhoshaththirkul Piravesi Endraan.
24 oru Thaalandhai Vaanginavan Vandhu: Aandavane, Neer Vidhaikkaadha Idaththil Arukkiravarum, Thelikkaadha Idaththil Serkkiravarumaana Kadinamulla Manushan Endru Ariven.
25 aagaiyaal, Naan Payandhu, Poi, Umadhu Thaalandhai Nilaththil Pudhaiththu Vaiththen; Idho, Ummudaiyadhai Vaangikkollum Endraan.
26 avanudaiya Ejamaan Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Pollaadhavanum Sompanumaana Oozhiyakkaarane, Naan Vidhaikkaadha Idaththil Arukkiravanendrum, Thelikkaadha Idaththil Serkkiravanendrum Arindhirundhaaye.
27 appadiyaanaal, Nee En Panaththaik Kaasukkaarar Vasaththil Pottuvaikkavendiyadhaayirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Naan Vandhu Ennudaiyadhai Vattiyode Vaangikkolvene, Endru Solli,
28 avanidaththilirukkira Thaalandhai Eduththu, Paththuth Thaalandhullavanukkuk Kodungal.
29 ullavanevano Avanukkuk Kodukkappadum, Paripooranamum Adaivaan; Illaadhavanidaththilirundhu Ulladhum Eduththukkollappadum.
30 pirayojanamatra Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Ivanaip Purampaana Irulile Thallippodungal; Ange Azhugaiyum Parkadippum Undaayirukkum Endraan.
31 andriyum Manushakumaaran Thamadhu Magimaiporundhinavaraai Sagala Parisuththa Thoodharodungooda Varumpodhu, Thamadhu Magimaiyulla Singaasanaththinmel Veetriruppaar.
32 appozhudhu, Sagala Janangalum Avarukku Munpaaga Serkkappaduvaargal. Meyppanaanavan Semmariyaadugalaiyum Vellaadugalaiyum Vevveraaga Pirikkiradhu Pola Avargalai Avar Piriththu,
33 semmariyaadugalaith Thamadhu Valadhu Pakkaththilum, Vellaadugalaith Thamadhu Idadhu Pakkaththilum Niruththuvaar.

34 appozhudhu, Raajaa Thamadhu Valadhu Pakkaththil Nirpavargalaip Paarththu: Vaarungal En Pidhaavinaal Aaseervadhikkappattavargale, Ulagam Undaanadhumudhal Ungalukkaaga Aayaththam Pannappattirukkira Raajyaththai Sudhandhariththukkollungal.
35  Pasiyaayirundhen, Enakkup Pojanangoduththeergal; Thaagamaayirundhen En Thaagaththaith Theerththeergal; Anniyanaay Irundhen Ennai Erththukkonteergal;
36 vasthiramillaadhirundhen, Enakku Vasthirangoduththeergal; Viyaadhiyaayirundhen, Ennai Visaarikka Vandheergal; Kaavalilirundhen, Ennaip Paarkkavandheergal Enpaar.

37 appozhudhu, Needhimaangal Avarukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Aandavare, Naangal Eppozhudhu Ummaip Pasiyullavargalaaka Kandu Umakkup Pojanangoduththom? Eppozhudhu Ummaith Thaagamullavargalaagak Kandu Ummudaiya Thaagaththaith Theerththom?
38 eppozhudhu Ummai Anniyaraagakkandu Ummai Serththukkondom? Eppozhudhu Ummai Vasthiramillaadhavaraakakkandu Umakku Vasthirangoduththom?
39 eppozhudhu Ummai Viyaadhiyullavaraagavum, Kaavalilirukkiravaraagavum Kandu, Ummidaththil Vandhom Enpaargal.

40 adharku Raajaa Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Migavum Siriyavaraagiya En Sagodhararaana Ivargalil Oruvanukku Neengal Edhaich Seydheergalo, Adhai Enakke Seydheergal Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Enpaar.

41 appozhudhu, Idadhupakkaththil Nirkiravargalaippaarththu Avar: Sabikkappattavargale, Ennaivittu, Pisaasukkaagavum Avan Thoodhargalukkaagavum Aayaththampannappattirukkira Niththiya Akkiniyile Pongal.
42 pasiyaayirundhen, Neengal Enakkup Pojanangodukkavillai; Thaagamaayirundhen Neengal En Thaagaththaith Theerkkavillai;

43 anniyanaayirundhen Neengal Ennai Serththukkollavillai; Vasthiramillaadhirundhen, Neengal Enakku Vasthirangodukkavillai; Viyaadhiyullavanaayum Kaavaliladaikkappattavanaayum Irundhen, Neengal Ennai Visaarikkavaravillai Enpaar.

44 appozhudhu, Avargalum Avarukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Aandavare, Ummaip Pasiyullavaraagavum, Thaagamullavaraagavum, Anniyaraagavum, Vasthiramillaadhavaraagavum, Viyaadhiyullavaraagavum, Kaavaliladaikkappattavaraagavum Naangal Eppozhudhu Kandu, Umakku Udhaviseyyaadhirundhom Enpaargal.

45 appozhudhu Avar Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Migavum Siriyavargalaagiya Ivargalil Oruvanukku Neengal Edhai Seyyaadhirundheergalo, Adhai Enakke Seyyaadhirundheergal Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Enpaar.
46 andhappadi, Ivargal Niththiya Aakkinai Adaiyavum, Needhimaangalo Niththiya Jeevanai Adaiyavum Povaargal Endraar.
